title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, we distribute the actions on a personal taste basis. This should be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view in order to access all the actions.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is missing from the context menu when selecting text.
EB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' should be included in the context menu when selecting text.
SR:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Right-click on the selected text to open the context menu. Verify that the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not present.
4. Switch to the Outline view.
5. Select the same text again.
6. Right-click on the selected text to open the context menu and verify that the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is now available.
